description:
*****Download Pocket Knights for FREE, and experience what 4 MILLION players around the world are raving about. 

Venture forth into an addictive fantasy world of dungeons, card battles, and strategy. Summon over 200 legendary Pocket Knights and create the greatest kingdom.

Evolve and Awaken your team of knights to become the ultimate party in your pocket! Choose from one of three starting heroes – warrior, mage, or hunter – and transform them into Awakened Heroes to lead your team to epic battles with friends and monstrous foes.

**************************************************************

WHAT PLAYERS ARE SAYING

＊＊＊＊＊ “A great combination of card-battle, fantasy, and strategy.”
＊＊＊＊＊ “When you get an awakened knight, my goodness…”
＊＊＊＊＊ “The super panda is cute!”



FEATURES 

► Free-to-play fantasy card battle RPG with kingdom management

► 200+ Pocket Knights to Awaken and become supreme Six Star Super Heroes

► 150+ trials of the colossal “Tower” to conquer

► A trove of legendary armor and treasure to collect

► Strategize attack formations with your Pocket Knights to achieve victory!

► Adventure into mysterious lands of land, air, and sea

► Test your team’s mettle at the Summoner’s Gate, Hidden Training Forest and PVP Arena!

► Use alchemy to transmute your items into gold, gold, GOLD!

 

COMPATIBLE DEVICES

Compatible with iPhone 5/5S/5C/4/4S, iPod touch and iPad 1/2/3. Compatible with iOS versions 4.3 and up.
releaseNotes:
New Underworld map unlocks the new adventure!
6th Hero in your team to help fighting monsters!
Auto battle and auto collect in Demon Battleground.
Offline Tower to ease out the game play.
Now finding your hidden training room just got easier.
New Totem skills and astral skills.
Item fortification, no need to open chests to fortify.
